body:
The steps to reproduce the above errors were

1) Download 56b11 en-US from here:

https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/56.0b11/

2) Create a new profile

3) Open the browser debugger

4) Find recipe enrollment errors

body_html:
The steps to reproduce the above errors were

  1. Download 56b11 en-US from here:

https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/56.0b11/

  1. Create a new profile

  2. Open the browser debugger

  3. Find recipe enrollment errors
